main event: On 23 September 1948, multiple witnesses reported seeing an unidentified aerial object over Santa Fe, New Mexico.
interesting points: The object was described as round and white, and estimated to be between 100 to 200 feet in diameter., One witness reported the object traveling at approximately 700-800 mph at an altitude of about 30,000 feet., The object emitted a bluish glare from the rear., A witness believed the object opened a path through clouds., The sighting lasted for about 15 to 20 minutes with no sound reported.
witness description: two individuals, including a building superintendent, who provided signed statements regarding the sighting
